thread.section_title: EagleSaver.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of EagleSaver.com | www.eaglesaver.com
thread.title: Mary

author: Mary
title: Mary
text: There message center needs a little work.Kept sending me the same email, when inquired about. Because it took a little longer than expected. With that said all and all they were as advertised. Also if you have items that they won't take, they'll send you an email asking if you would like them returned. With no shipping charge. Would recommend to a friend or anybody on the fence about it.
